titleStmt.title: A seasonable addresse to both Houses of Parliament, concerning the succession the fears of popery, and arbitrary government. By a true Protestant and hearty lover of his countrey.
titleStmt.author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.

notesStmt.note: A true Protestant and hearty lover of his countrey = George Savile, Marquis of Halifax.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
